text:
Today, Apple has introduced a new Sky Blue color for the iPhone 16 Pro and iPhone 16 Pro Max!

You can order the new color on April 4th and will be available on April 11th. Now make sure to check the alt-text on the image!
Not cool . There is place in hell waiting for you
The Sierra blue iPhone 13 Pro Max is the best looking phone they’ve made!
Why would you joke like this
Shoutout to people who actually thought it was true
I’m so glad this is fake because I would’ve wanted one!
